actions.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 248 (Roll no. 591).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment sought to allow for a program of eligible projects to count as a single project to meet the $100 million threshold of project costs.
purpose: An amendment numbered 31 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to allows for a program of eligible projects to count as a single project to meet the $100,000,000 threshold of project costs.
